name: Pixel Ball: Laser
description:
"Pixel Ball: Laser" is a physics balls like game with some interesting special bricks. The bright pixel style is refreshing. The goal of the game is to get the highest score. This game makes people relax and relieve pressure. The bright pixel style is refreshing. 

The feature of this game is the addition of two special bricks:

  • Laser bricks can strike a row or column of bricks.
  • Direction bricks can randomly change the direction of the ball.

Let's start playing!
